languages.text: "Ради выгоды, разумеется. Большая часть того, что можно подобрать во время высадки — сущий мусор для вас, однако для других, менее удачливых и обеспеченных слуг Императора, это настоящие сокровища... тем более — полученные из рук великого Вольного Торговца! Фанатики-друзианцы и головорезы-пираты, дельцы из Касбаллики и Эксплораторы — никто из них не откажется от нашей помощи в эти сложные и темные времена. И, быть может, придет время, когда помощь потребуется и нам, а от союзников дождаться ее куда вероятнее".

traits.locale_text: "Ради выгоды, разумеется. Большая часть того, что можно подобрать во время высадки — сущий мусор для вас, однако для других, менее удачливых и обеспеченных слуг Императора, это настоящие сокровища... тем более — полученные из рук великого Вольного Торговца! Фанатики-друзианцы и головорезы-пираты, дельцы из Касбаллики и Эксплораторы — никто из них не откажется от нашей помощи в эти сложные и темные времена. И, быть может, придет время, когда помощь потребуется и нам, а от союзников дождаться ее куда вероятнее".

languages.text: "To profit from them, of course. Most of the things you will find during expeditions are complete junk to one such as yourself, but the less fortunate and affluent servants of the Emperor think them treasures... especially when they are bestowed by the great Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}! Drusian fanatics and pirate cutthroats, Kasballica dealers and Explorators — none will refuse our help in these dark and trying times. And there may come a time when we shall be the ones requiring aid, and it would be beneficial to have allies willing to provide it."
languages.original_text: "Ради выгоды, разумеется. Большая часть того, что можно подобрать во время высадки — сущий мусор для вас, однако для других, менее удачливых и обеспеченных слуг Императора, это настоящие сокровища... тем более — полученные из рук великого Вольного Торговца! Фанатики-друзианцы и головорезы-пираты, дельцы из Касбаллики и Эксплораторы — никто из них не откажется от нашей помощи в эти сложные и темные времена. И, быть может, придет время, когда помощь потребуется и нам, а от союзников дождаться ее куда вероятнее".

traits.locale_text: "To profit from them, of course. Most of the things you can find during the expeditions are complete garbage for you, but the less fortunate and affluent servants of the Emperor think them to be treasures... Especially since they were bestowed by the great Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}! Drusian fanatics and pirate cutthroats, Kasballica dealers and Explorators — nobody will turn down our help in these dark and trying times. And there may be time when we will be the ones requiring aid, and then the allies would be more likely to provide it."

"To profit from them, of course. Most of the things you can find during the expeditions are complete garbage for you, but the less fortunate and affluent servants of the Emperor think them to be treasures... Especially since they were bestowed by the great Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}! Drusian fanatics and pirate cutthroats, Kasballica dealers and Explorators — nobody will turn down our help in these dark and trying times. And there may be time when we will be the ones requiring aid, and then the allies would be more likely to provide it."

"To profit from them, of course. Most of the things you will find during expeditions, for someone such as yourself, are complete junk, but the less fortunate and affluent servants of the Emperor think them to be treasures... Especially if they were bestowed by the great Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}! Drusian fanatics and pirate cutthroats, Kasballica dealers and Explorators — nobody will turn down our help in these dark and trying times. And there may be time when we will be the ones requiring aid, and if would be beneficial to have willing allies to provide it."

Drusian fanatics and pirate cutthroats, Kasballica dealers and Explorators — nobody will turn down our help in these dark and trying times. And there may be time when we will be the ones requiring aid, and if would be beneficial to have willing allies to provide it."

Drusian fanatics and pirate cutthroats, Kasballica dealers and Explorators — none will refuse our help in these dark and trying times. And there may come a time when we shall be the ones requiring aid, and it would be beneficial to have allies willing to provide it."

"To profit from them, of course. Most of the things you will find during expeditions are complete junk to one such as yourself, but the less fortunate and affluent servants of the Emperor think them treasures... especially when they are bestowed by the great Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}! Drusian fanatics and pirate cutthroats, Kasballica dealers and Explorators — none will refuse our help in these dark and trying times. And there may come a time when we shall be the ones requiring aid, and it would be beneficial to have allies willing to provide it."

languages.text: “当然是为了从中获利。您在远征中发现的绝大多数资源，对您这样的人而言是彻头彻尾的垃圾，但对帝皇那些不太富有的仆人而言，它们都是价值连城的宝物……而且是由伟大的行商浪人{mf|本人|本人}亲手赐予的宝物！如今的生计很困难，无论是德鲁苏斯的那群狂信徒、沿途打劫的星际海盗、卡斯巴利卡的商人，还是那些开拓者，都不会拒绝我们的帮助。或许有一天，会轮到我们寻求他人的帮助。如果到时候有盟友愿意为我们提供帮助，这无疑是件好事。”
languages.original_text: "To profit from them, of course. Most of the things you will find during expeditions are complete junk to one such as yourself, but the less fortunate and affluent servants of the Emperor think them treasures... especially when they are bestowed by the great Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}! Drusian fanatics and pirate cutthroats, Kasballica dealers and Explorators — none will refuse our help in these dark and trying times. And there may come a time when we shall be the ones requiring aid, and it would be beneficial to have allies willing to provide it."

traits.locale_text: “当然是为了从中获利。您在远征中发现的绝大多数资源，对您这样的人而言是彻头彻尾的垃圾，但对帝皇那些不太富有的仆人而言，它们都是价值连城的宝物……而且是由伟大的行商浪人{mf|本人|本人}亲手赐予的宝物！如今的生计很困难，无论是德鲁苏斯的那群狂信徒、沿途打劫的星际海盗、卡斯巴利卡的商人，还是那些开拓者，都不会拒绝我们的帮助。或许有一天，会轮到我们寻求他人的帮助。如果到时候有盟友愿意为我们提供帮助，这无疑是件好事。”

languages.text: «Para lucrarnos, claro. La mayoría de las cosas que encuentra en sus expediciones no son más que chatarra para alguien de su categoría, pero para los siervos menos afortunados y acaudalados del Emperador son auténticos tesoros... ¡especialmente si vienen de manos de{mf|l| la} gran Comerciante Independiente en persona! Los fanáticos drusianos, los piratas más sanguinarios, los traficantes de la Kasballica y los exploradores: todos están dispuestos a aceptar la ayuda que ofrecemos en estos tiempos tan difíciles. Y, en el hipotético caso de que llegue el momento en el que seamos nosotros quienes necesitamos ayuda, convendría tener aliados dispuestos a prestárnosla».
languages.original_text: "To profit from them, of course. Most of the things you will find during expeditions are complete junk to one such as yourself, but the less fortunate and affluent servants of the Emperor think them treasures... especially when they are bestowed by the great Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}! Drusian fanatics and pirate cutthroats, Kasballica dealers and Explorators — none will refuse our help in these dark and trying times. And there may come a time when we shall be the ones requiring aid, and it would be beneficial to have allies willing to provide it."

traits.locale_text: «Para lucrarnos, claro. La mayoría de las cosas que encuentra en sus expediciones no son más que chatarra para alguien de su categoría, pero para los siervos menos afortunados y acaudalados del Emperador son auténticos tesoros... ¡especialmente si vienen de manos de{mf|l| la} gran Comerciante Independiente en persona! Los fanáticos drusianos, los piratas más sanguinarios, los traficantes de la Kasballica y los exploradores: todos están dispuestos a aceptar la ayuda que ofrecemos en estos tiempos tan difíciles. Y, en el hipotético caso de que llegue el momento en el que seamos nosotros quienes necesitamos ayuda, convendría tener aliados dispuestos a prestárnosla».

languages.text: 「もちろん、利益を得るためでございます。探検中に見つかるもののほとんどは、あなた様のような方にはガラクタ同然かもしれませんが、皇帝に仕える恵まれぬ者たちには、宝物に見えるのです…特に、それが偉大な自由開拓者自身から贈られたものとあれば！ドルシアンの狂信者、海賊の殺し屋、カスバリカの売人、探検艦隊――この暗く困難な時代に、我々の助けを拒む者はいないでしょう。そして、いずれは我々が援助を必要とする時が来るかもしれない。その時に、手を貸してくれる仲間がいるというのは、有益なことでしょう」
languages.original_text: "To profit from them, of course. Most of the things you will find during expeditions are complete junk to one such as yourself, but the less fortunate and affluent servants of the Emperor think them treasures... especially when they are bestowed by the great Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}! Drusian fanatics and pirate cutthroats, Kasballica dealers and Explorators — none will refuse our help in these dark and trying times. And there may come a time when we shall be the ones requiring aid, and it would be beneficial to have allies willing to provide it."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろん、利益を得るためでございます。探検中に見つかるもののほとんどは、あなたのような者にはまったくのガラクタですが、皇帝に仕える恵まれぬ者たちは、それらを宝物と考えているのです…特に、それが偉大なローグトレーダーから贈られたものとあれば！ドルスス派の狂信者、海賊の殺し屋、カスバリカの売人、探検艦隊 ― この暗く困難な時代に、我々の助けを拒む者はいないでしょう。そして、いずれは我々が援助を必要とする時が来るかもしれない。その時に、援助をもたらしてくれる仲間がいることは、有益となるでしょう」

languages.text: "Um Profit zu machen, natürlich. Das Meiste, was Ihr bei Expeditionen finden werdet, ist für jemanden wie Euch nur Müll, aber diese weniger glücklichen und begüterten Diener des Imperators halten sie für Schätze ... umso mehr, wenn sie von {mf|dem großen Freihändler|der großen Freihändlerin} selbst kommen! Drusianische Fanatiker und Piraten-Halsabschneider, Kasballica-Händler und Exploratoren – niemand wird in diesen dunklen und schweren Zeiten unsere Hilfe ablehnen. Und vielleicht werden auch wir irgendwann Unterstützung brauchen, und es wäre sinnvoll, Verbündete zu haben, die sie dann gewähren."
languages.original_text: "To profit from them, of course. Most of the things you will find during expeditions are complete junk to one such as yourself, but the less fortunate and affluent servants of the Emperor think them treasures... especially when they are bestowed by the great Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}! Drusian fanatics and pirate cutthroats, Kasballica dealers and Explorators — none will refuse our help in these dark and trying times. And there may come a time when we shall be the ones requiring aid, and it would be beneficial to have allies willing to provide it."

traits.locale_text: "Um Profit zu machen, natürlich. Das Meiste, was Ihr bei Expeditionen finden werdet, ist für jemanden wie Euch nur Müll, aber diese weniger glücklichen und begüterten Diener des Imperators halten sie für Schätze ... umso mehr, wenn sie von {mf|dem großen Freihändler|der großen Freihändlerin} selbst kommen! Drusianische Fanatiker und Piraten-Halsabschneider, Kasballica-Händler und Exploratoren – niemand wird in diesen dunklen und schweren Zeiten unsere Hilfe ablehnen. Und vielleicht werden auch wir irgendwann Unterstützung brauchen, und es wäre sinnvoll, Verbündete zu haben, die sie dann gewähren."

languages.text: « Pour en tirer profit, bien évidemment. L'essentiel de ce que vous ramènerez de vos expéditions n'aura aucune valeur pour quelqu'un comme vous. En revanche, les serviteurs de l'Empereur moins chanceux ou fortunés considéreront vos trouvailles comme des trésors... en particulier s'ils les tiennent {mf|du puissant libre-marchand|de la puissante libre-marchande} en personne ! Des fanatiques drusiens aux pirates les plus impitoyables, en passant par les agents de la Kasballica ou les Explorators, nul ne refusera notre aide en ces temps difficiles. Et il se peut que nous ayons un jour besoin de l'assistance d'autrui. Avoir des alliés ne peut que nous être profitable. »
languages.original_text: "To profit from them, of course. Most of the things you will find during expeditions are complete junk to one such as yourself, but the less fortunate and affluent servants of the Emperor think them treasures... especially when they are bestowed by the great Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}! Drusian fanatics and pirate cutthroats, Kasballica dealers and Explorators — none will refuse our help in these dark and trying times. And there may come a time when we shall be the ones requiring aid, and it would be beneficial to have allies willing to provide it."

traits.locale_text: « Pour en tirer profit, bien évidemment. L'essentiel de ce que vous ramènerez de vos expéditions n'aura aucune valeur pour quelqu'un comme vous. En revanche, les serviteurs de l'Empereur moins chanceux ou fortunés considéreront vos trouvailles comme des trésors... en particulier s'ils les tiennent {mf|du puissant libre-marchand|de la puissante libre-marchande} en personne ! Des fanatiques drusiens aux pirates les plus impitoyables, en passant par les agents de la Kasballica ou les Explorateurs, nul ne refusera notre aide en ces temps difficiles. Et il se peut que nous ayons un jour besoin de l'assistance d'autrui. Avoir des alliés ne peut que nous être profitable. »

languages.text: "Neden olacak, kâr etmek için. Keşif gezileriniz sırasında bulacağınız şeylerin çoğu sizin gibi birine çer çöp gelebilir ama İmparator'un bu kadar talih ve gönence sahip olmayan hizmetkârları için onlar birer hazine. Özellikle de bizzat yüce Hür Tacir tarafından bahşedildiklerinde! Drususçu fanatiklerden cani korsanlara, Kasballica tüccarlarından Keşiftörlere kadar hiç kimse bu karanlık ve zor zamanlarda yardımımızı geri çevirmeyecektir. Ayrıca bizim de dara düştüğümüz vakit geldiğinde yardım eli uzatmaya hevesli müttefiklerimizin olması faydalı olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "To profit from them, of course. Most of the things you will find during expeditions are complete junk to one such as yourself, but the less fortunate and affluent servants of the Emperor think them treasures... especially when they are bestowed by the great Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}! Drusian fanatics and pirate cutthroats, Kasballica dealers and Explorators — none will refuse our help in these dark and trying times. And there may come a time when we shall be the ones requiring aid, and it would be beneficial to have allies willing to provide it."

Özellikle de bizzat yüce Hür Tacir tarafından bahşedildiklerinde! Drususçu fanatiklerden cani korsanlara, Kasballica tüccarlarından Keşiftörlere kadar hiç kimse bu karanlık ve zor zamanlarda yardımımızı geri çevirmeyecektir. Ayrıca bizim de dara düştüğümüz vakit geldiğinde yardım eli uzatmaya hevesli müttefiklerimizin olması faydalı olacaktır."
